005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultiline;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultilineAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFieldValue;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaField;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
020
021import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
022import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
023
024/**
025 * Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks
026 * parent.
027 */
028@SuppressWarnings({
029    "PMD.DataClass",
030    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
031})
032@MetaschemaField(
033    formalName = "Remarks",
034    description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
035    name = "remarks",
036    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
037public class Remarks implements IBoundObject {
038  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
039
040  /**
041   * "Mark as &lsquo;XML&rsquo; for XML-only or &lsquo;JSON&rsquo; for JSON-only
042   * remarks."
043   */
044  @BoundFlag(
045      formalName = "Remark Class",
046      description = "Mark as 'XML' for XML-only or 'JSON' for JSON-only remarks.",
047      name = "class",
048      defaultValue = "ALL",
049      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
050      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
051          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "XML", description = "The remark applies to only XML representations."),
052              @AllowedValue(value = "JSON", description = "The remark applies to only JSON and YAML representations."),
053              @AllowedValue(value = "ALL", description = "The remark applies to all representations.") })))
054  private String _clazz;
055
056  @BoundFieldValue(
057      valueKeyName = "remark",
058      typeAdapter = MarkupMultilineAdapter.class)
059  private MarkupMultiline _remark;
060
061  public Remarks() {
062    this(null);
063  }
064
065  public Remarks(IMetaschemaData data) {
066    this.__metaschemaData = data;
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
071    return __metaschemaData;
072  }
073
074  public String getClazz() {
075    return _clazz;
076  }
077
078  public void setClazz(String value) {
079    _clazz = value;
080  }
081
082  public MarkupMultiline getRemark() {
083    return _remark;
084  }
085
086  public void setRemark(MarkupMultiline value) {
087    _remark = value;
088  }
089
090  @Override
091  public String toString() {
092    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
093  }
094}
